text:
Are there any rules on broadcasted assignments when the array is on both the left and the right side of the assignment? For example
```
julia> x = Float64[2,3,4];

julia> x ./= (@view x[[1,1,1]])
3-element Vector{Float64}:
 1.0
 1.5
 2.0```
seems to work as I would expect, but I could imagine that it could as well return `[1.0, 3.0, 4.0]`

Because of the order of operations:

If `x[1]`  is assigned `x[1] \ x[1] == 1.0`  and then this value is used to calculate
`x[2] = x[2] \ x[1]` , then `x[2]` would keep the value 3.0
